name: Bomb Jack (MSX1)
description:
This final version is an expansion of a previous version made for an academic paper on MSX (in this link you can access said paper -only in Spanish-). In this version all the elements that were missing in the previous version have been included.

Note:
This is a version of Bomb Jack for MSX1. Of course, it can run on an MSX2 but if that is the case, it is recommended to play the Kralizec version for a better feeling.
